content.query:
USE nyc_ldw

-- Create taxi zone table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc_ldw.bronze.taxi_zone
    (   LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(30),
        Zone VARCHAR(30),
        service_zone VARCHAR(30)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
        
    );
